segments.text: My stay is over . Here's the key to my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . And here's your receipt , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope your stay here was satisfactory , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This could be a great hotel , once you get rid of the insects . The city itself is great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad that the little problem didn't ruin your visit . Please have a pleasant trip home .
segments.speaker: S2
